message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item to you for $95. I think it's a great deal for something you'll really value.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $85. I'm willing to meet you halfway and pay a bit more, but I'd like to see if we can come to a mutually beneficial agreement.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm valuing the item a bit higher. How about we settle at $90?

I understand your perspective, but I'm still a bit hesitant to pay $90. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and offer $87.50. I think this is a fair price considering the value I'll get from the product.
